models.description: Table storing user information for authentication and management
models.name: todo_list_users

plainFields.description: Unique username chosen by the user for login
plainFields.name: username

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created
plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user information was last updated
plainFields.name: updated_at

foreignFields.description: User who owns this Todo item. {@link todo_list_users.id}.
foreignFields.name: user_id

plainFields.description: Text content of the Todo item.
plainFields.name: content

plainFields.description: Whether the Todo item is completed.
plainFields.name: completed

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the Todo item was created.
plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the Todo item was last updated.
plainFields.name: updated_at
